definition: amusing/fun/interesting
to be playful/to be fond of one's fun
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
erhua variant of 好玩[hao3 wan2]

sentences.english: That was so cool! Hey, Dad, did you see that?
sentences.chinese: 哇，好好玩啦嘿，爸爸看到沒有？

sentences.english: It's also my name. It translates to Tall Rice and Chinese people find it hilarious.
sentences.chinese: 這也是我的名字，譯作米高，中國人覺得很好玩。

sentences.english: Was a master of magic cube small games, playing very well.
sentences.chinese: 一位高手寫的魔方小遊戲，挺好玩的。

sentences.english: Thing is, headphones don’t offer much warmth and getting cold ears isn’t fun.
sentences.chinese: 問題是，耳機不能保暖，耳朵越來越冷這就不好玩了。

sentences.english: That's funny, you still funny, Logan. You know where Victor is?
sentences.chinese: 真好玩洛根你還是那麼有趣你知道維克多在哪嗎？

sentences.english: Do you want to run around the park just for the holl of it ?
sentences.chinese: 那你想要繞着公園跑僅僅是爲了好玩？

sentences.english: Buddy, here I've got a cool game to show ya, it's called "Gangstas".
sentences.chinese: 哥們兒，我發現一款超好玩的遊戲，叫“古惑仔”。

sentences.english: Amused by her mock seriousness, I moved to her right breast.
sentences.chinese: 她的故作嚴肅真好玩，我就湊向她的右乳。

sentences.english: Did it just for the fun of it, but was too lazy to stay by the union.
sentences.chinese: 他搞罷工只是爲了好玩，可是太懶，不願留在工會里。

sentences.english: Where's a good place to visit, Richie?
sentences.chinese: 瑞琪，哪兒有好玩的地方啊？

sentences.english: And I think there’s a lot of fun to be had there with her character.
sentences.chinese: 而且我覺得做老媽這個角色的時候很好玩。

sentences.english: We boated with his feelings for fun.
sentences.chinese: 我們依着他的感受，就是爲了好玩。

sentences.english: It is more fun to go with someone than to go alone.
sentences.chinese: 偕伴同去比自己獨自去好玩。
你有什麼好玩的遊戲呢？

sentences.english: Hollywood is the best if you want to come, have a good time, party,
sentences.chinese: 你要想來好好玩，聚會，好萊塢再好不過了。

sentences.english: What makes Covent Garden such a wonderful place?
sentences.chinese: 什麼使得科芬園成爲如此好玩的地方？

definition: erhua variant of 好玩[hao3 wan2]
interesting/fascinating/amusing
to play/to have fun/to hang out
variant of 玩[wan2]/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
interesting/to interest
fun/interest/delight/taste/liking/preference
good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
interesting/meaningful/enjoyable/fun
novelty/new and odd
to stay/to stop/to tease (play with)/amusing/short pause in reading aloud, equivalent to comma (also written 讀|读[dou4])
boring/of no interest
bored/boring/senseless
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
oh alas/hey!/hi! (loanword)/a high (natural or drug-induced) (loanword)
to satisfy a craving/to get a kick out of sth/gratifying/immensely enjoyable/satisfying/fulfilling
